snippet: Stacy Lewis shot a two-under-par 69 even while missing several makable putts to grab a share of the lead with Meena Lee after three rounds at the North Texas L.P.G.A. Shootout in Irving.
abstract: Stacy Lewis and Meena Lee share third-round lead at North Texas LPGA Shootout; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Stacy Lewis shot a two-under-par 69 even while missing several makable putts to grab a share of the lead with Meena Lee after three rounds at the North Texas L.P.G.A. Shootout in Irving.
